author: fmenge:ez.no
msg: - Renamed getType() into getTypeName(), where it just returns a string, but not

author: fmenge:ez.no
msg: - Merged overloading improvements from ezcReflectionClass into the other classes
- Merged recent changes from ezcReflectionClass into ezcReflectionObject

author: fmenge:ez.no
msg: - Introduced constants for canonical type names in ezcReflectionTypeMapper
- Changed implementations of types and type mapper to use the new constants
- Introduced new methods getKeyType(), getValueType(), and isList() to
- Implemented support for resource, number, and callback
- Added non-trivial implementations of getTypes() and getTypeName() to
- Improved test cases for TypeMapper and TypeFactory
